alert.note: Alert for Ashley; Chicot (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 12 at 12:57AM CDT until March 12 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Chicot County in southeastern Arkansas... Ashley County in southeastern Arkansas... * Until 100 AM CST. * At 1156 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Dermott to near Fountain Hill to near Hilo, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Dermott around 1200 AM CST. Mcmillan Corner and Snyder around 1210 AM CST. Lake Village around 1215 AM CST. West Crossett around 1220 AM CST. Portland, Montrose and Old Milo around 1225 AM CST. Crossett and North Crossett around 1230 AM CST. Hamburg around 1240 AM CST. Eudora, Chicot Junction and Berlin around 1250 AM CST. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Halley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
